page.title: 02C.M. Art and Craft Clubs.
page.content: The members of The Shammick Art Group meet each Thursday afternoon at the Community Centre to draw and paint. Each year during the week of the Spring Holiday the Group holds a one day Exhibition & Sale of Art and Craft items made by the members. A proportion of the proceeds is given to charity. During the school summer holidays the local Cancer Research Committee takes over two of the classrooms at the Primary School and the Art Group holds a three week exhibition. A proportion of the proceeds is donated to Cancer Research There is also a Craft club which meets during the winter where crafts are demonstrated such as quilting, patchwork,crochet,smocking,tapestry, macrame,calligraphy,flower arranging and cooking etc.
